|brand = Tenda |model = Mesh3 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (Nova MW6) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, wireless system, mesh node |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = V7TMESH3 |icid = 9034A-MESH3 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 10033428 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8197FS;RTL8197FS, H4C81P3 GH15E5; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- 1.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q127CSIG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Realtek;RTL8197FS;onchip; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8363NB; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |oui = E8:65:D4 |ethoui = E8:65:D4
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, Alexa |addchip = 2.4GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85331-11;85331-11, 58684ES4, 1710 MX;2; ,,, 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85743-11;85743-11, 59524ES4, 1713 MX;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/23/2017 |estreldate = 10/30/2017 |estprice = 250 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B076JLJVTG |asin_country = US |asin2 = B076VPYT36 |asin_country2 = GB |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812BR;RTL8812BRH, H2A67E1 GH07; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "10033428" and "V1.1" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :May also be referred to by the model name '''Nova MW6'''.
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/tenda-nova-whole-home-mesh-wifi-system-realtek-based.40997/ ''Tenda Nova Whole Home Mesh WiFi System'' on '''SNB''' forums]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/tenda-nova-mw6-review ''Tenda Nova MW6 review'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] *[http://www.acwifi.net/5465.html ''Tenda Nova MW6'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) ([http://www.acwifi.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/SAM_3553-2.jpg PCB images])
==See also== :[[List of Wireless Systems#Tenda Nova]] *[[Tenda nova MW5 (Mesh5s)|Tenda Mesh5s]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH5S (2018-07-20) *[[Tenda nova MW5 (Mesh5)|Tenda Mesh5]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH5 (2018-07-19) *[[Tenda Mesh3-18 (Nova MW6 2018)|Tenda Mesh3s-18]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3-18 (2018-05-09) *[[Tenda Mesh3f (Nova MW3)|Tenda Mesh3f]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3F (2018-05-02) *[[Tenda Mesh3s]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3S (2018-01-24) *[[Tenda Mesh3 (Nova MW6) |Tenda Mesh3]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3 (2017-08-23)
